alert.note: Alert for Oregon (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 10 at 1:53PM CST until March 11 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...MINOR SNOW ACCUMULATIONS EXPECTED... .A winter storm will approach the Ozarks Region tonight causing widespread light snow to expand through the area. Some travel impacts are likely tonight through Friday. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 6 PM CST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Light snow expected. Total snow accumulations up to one inch. There could be pockets of ice accumulations of around a glaze. * WHERE...Oregon County. * WHEN...From 3 AM to 6 PM CST Friday. * IMPACTS...Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will likely become slick and hazardous. Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Friday morning and evening commutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Call 1-888-275-6636 for road conditions.
